subject: More buttons on shifter
description_text:
Hello, I bought one USB 7+R H Simulator Gear Shifter, and I can see on
Windows that has more 2 unused buttons, showing 10 on total, but only 8
used by the shifter.
Is it possible to install 2 more buttons soldering on the board? I would
like to adapt 2 buttons to be possible to play Eurotruck, having the full
shift of scania.
Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Tomy, Hello, it’s not easy to modify this directly, as it involves firmware changes, circuit connections, and soldering work.

Hi, thanks for the response.
I have soldering skils, and I think is not necessary firmware, as the 2
extra buttons are already displayed on Windows. Do you have the circuit
schematic?


Em sex., 10 de out. de 2025, 22:03, service@simsonn.com
